veryeasy on phire heavy industries https://www.phireheavyindustries.com"/categories/veryeasy/ Recent content in veryeasy on phire heavy industries Hugo -- gohugo.io en Wed, 11 May 2022 00:00:00 +0000 Baby Encription https://www.phireheavyindustries.com"/p/baby-encription/ Wed, 11 May 2022 00:00:00 +0000 https://www.phireheavyindustries.com"/p/baby-encription/

You are after an organised crime group which is responsible for the illegal weapon market in your country. As a secret agent, you have infiltrated the group enough to be included in meetings with clients. During the last negotiation, you found one of the confidential messages for the customer. It contains crucial information about the delivery. Do you think you can decrypt it?

I cannot reverse the code for the file but i can run the samething and compare to the string that i already have.

enc = "6e0a9372ec49a3f6930ed8723f9df6f6720ed8d89dc4937222ec7214d89d1e0e352ce0aa6ec82bf622227bb70e7fb7352249b7d893c493d8539dec8fb7935d490e7f9d22ec89b7a322ec8fd80e7f8921"

a = bytes.fromhex(enc)

#print(a)

decrypted = ""

for char in a:
    for key in range(1, 126):
        if ((123 * key + 18) % 256) == char:
            decrypted += chr(key)
            
print(decrypted)
